Ruby.en: Has a high critical-hit ratio. May also poison.

Sapphire.en: Has a high critical-hit ratio. May also poison.

Emerald.en: Has a high critical-hit ratio. May also poison.

FireRed.en: An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also poison the foe.
FireRed.de: Angriff mit hoher Volltrefferquote. Der Gegner wird evtl. vergiftet.

LeafGreen.de: Angriff mit hoher Volltrefferquote. Der Gegner wird evtl. vergiftet.

Black.en: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
